bug.author: spacelg
bug.summary: MLPACK failed to run ANNLayerTest test on release and debug configuration with MSVC on windows
bug.description:
MLPACK failed to run ANNLayerTest test on release and debug configuration with MSVC on windows. I use latest version <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/commit/897b0cddf6ba23733f701b4679fac08f9f90ebb2>897b0cd</denchmark-link> . Could you please help look at this? Thanks a lot! You can repro this issue as the steps below:
git clone https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack D:\MLPACK\src it dependent armadillo and OpenBlas, put them to D:\MLPACK\external\ open a VS 2017 amd64 command prompt as admin and browse to D:\MLPACK mkdir build_x64 && pushd build_x64 cmake -G "Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64" -DBLAS_LIBRARY=D:\MLPACK\build_x64..\external\OpenBLAS.0.2.14.1\lib\native\lib\x64\libopenblas.dll.a -DLAPACK_LIBRARY=D:\MLPACK\build_x64..\external\OpenBLAS.0.2.14.1\lib\native\lib\x64\libopenblas.dll.a -DARMADILLO_INCLUDE_DIR=D:\MLPACK\build_x64..\external\armadillo-9.200.4\include -DARMADILLO_LIBRARY=D:\MLPACK\build_x64..\external\armadillo-9.200.4\lib\armadillo.lib -DBOOST_INCLUDEDIR=C:\boost_1_67_0\x64 -DBOOST_LIBRARYDIR=C:\boost_1_67_0\x64\lib64-msvc-14.1 -DDEBUG=OFF -DPROFILE=OFF ..\src msbuild /m /p:Configuration=Release;Platform=x64;PreferredToolArchitecture=x64 mlpack.sln /t:Rebuild ctest --build-config Release -V -R "ANNLayerTest"
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/files/3324453/log_x64_test.log>log_x64_test.log</denchmark-link>
Failures: D:\MLPACK\build_x64>ctest --build-config Release -V -R "ANNLayerTest" UpdateCTestConfiguration from :D:/MLPACK/build_x64/DartConfiguration.tcl UpdateCTestConfiguration from :D:/MLPACK/build_x64/DartConfiguration.tcl Test project D:/MLPACK/build_x64 Constructing a list of tests Done constructing a list of tests Updating test list for fixtures Added 0 tests to meet fixture requirements Checking test dependency graph... Checking test dependency graph end test 6 Start 6: ANNLayerTest 6: Test command: D:\MLPACK\build_x64\Release\mlpack_test.exe "-t" "ANNLayerTest" 6: Test timeout computed to be: 10000000 6: Running 66 test cases... 6: D:/MLPACK/src/src/mlpack/tests/ann_layer_test.cpp(1903): fatal error: in "ANNLayerTest/GradientAtrousConvolutionLayerTest": critical check CheckGradient(function) <= 0.2 has failed [1 > 0.20000000000000001] 6: 6: *** 1 failure is detected in the test module "mlpackTest" 1/1 Test <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/issues/6>#6</denchmark-link> : ANNLayerTest .....................***Failed 2.88 sec 0% tests passed, 1 tests failed out of 1 Total Test time (real) = 2.96 sec The following tests FAILED: 6 - ANNLayerTest (Failed) Errors while running CTest

comments.comment: Thanks for the report, there is an open issue for the GradientAtrousConvolutionLayer: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/issues/1936>#1936</denchmark-link> , which should be the same issue you see on your system.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had any recent activity. It will be closed in 7 days if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions! üëç
